Articles.Title: Spotify vs. Apple: Why We Need To Stop Using Bad Analogies
Articles.Subtitle: Spotify and Apple have been fighting recently, and commentary from both sides has been shaped by potentially misleading analogies.

Articles.Title: Get Excited About Learning Racket
Articles.Subtitle: If you're a first year Waterloo student, chances are you've never worked with a language like Racket. Here's why you should be excited.
